column4: I tried to install ubuntu 8.10 and I got unresolved usb devices
and cdrom io error messages. I changed cd's, redownloaded image
burned it again, changed dvd drives and same thing happens. Any
ideas? I'm using ubuntu 8.10 here at work and it rocks. Btw I
also tried same cd I used here
dont flood like that, also, did you md5 check the iso? did you check the cd for defects on the first boot screen
